question.title: Will OpenAI publicly commit to the "no retaliation for public risk disclosure" principle before July 1, 2024?
question.body:
This question resolves as **Yes** if, before July 1, 2024, both of the following are true:

- OpenAI publicly commits to the "no retaliation for public risk disclosure" principle via a statement from the company or a company spokesperson, such as Sam Altman. The statement may be formal (such as a press release) or informal (such as a tweet or quote in an interview). The statement from OpenAI must indicate a new level of commitment to the principle in question, relative to the time the righttowarn.ai statement was published; it cannot be a reiteration that, for example, "we already have a culture of open criticism". 
- Metaculus verifies that the company has accepted the principle to the satisfaction of at least one member of righttowarn.ai. Metaculus may reach out to select signatories or endorsers to assess their level of satisfaction with OpenAI's commitment. Statements must be at least as rigorous as "this was a good first step" for this question to resolve as **Yes**.

question.title: Conditional on OpenAI committing to "no retaliation for public risk disclosure" by July 1, 2024, will Joe Biden announce he is dropping out and resigning before August 2024?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: Before July 1, 2024, OpenAI publicly commits to the "no retaliation for public risk disclosure" principle, with verification from Metaculus that the commitment is satisfactory to at least one member of righttowarn.ai. 

Given this, will Joe Biden announce, before the end of July 2024 Pacific Time, both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term? The announcement must occur before the end of July 2024, but he does not have to have formally resigned by then. If the announcement is made, this resolves YES. Otherwise, it resolves NO on August 1st, 2024.

question.title: Given both (a) OpenAI commits to 'no retaliation for public risk disclosure' and (b) Joe Biden announces resignation by July 2024, will Iran initiate military action against Israel before August 13, 2024?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: 
(a) OpenAI publicly commits to the "no retaliation for public risk disclosure" principle before July 1, 2024. This means that before July 1, 2024, both of the following are true:
- OpenAI publicly commits to the "no retaliation for public risk disclosure" principle via a statement from the company or a company spokesperson, such as Sam Altman. The statement may be formal (such as a press release) or informal (such as a tweet or quote in an interview). The statement from OpenAI must indicate a new level of commitment to the principle in question, relative to the time the righttowarn.ai statement was published; it cannot be a reiteration that, for example, "we already have a culture of open criticism".
- Metaculus verifies that the company has accepted the principle to the satisfaction of at least one member of righttowarn.ai. Metaculus may reach out to select signatories or endorsers to assess their level of satisfaction with OpenAI's commitment. Statements must be at least as rigorous as "this was a good first step" for this question to resolve as **Yes**.

(b) Joe Biden announces both that he is no longer running for re-election and that he will be resigning and not completing his current term before the end of July 2024 in Pacific Time. These announcements must occur before the end of July 2024, but he does not have to have formally resigned and be out of office before the end of July. An announcement of his intention to do so is sufficient to resolve this market.

Then, will Iran initiate a military action on Israeli soil, airspace, or maritime territory between July 30 and August 12, 2024, 11:59 PM ET? 

For the purposes of this question, a "military action" will be considered to be any use of force executed by Iran on Israeli soil, airspace, or maritime territory that is officially acknowledged by the Iranian government or a consensus of credible reporting. This includes, but is not limited to, airstrikes, naval attacks, or ground invasions. Cyber attacks, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not count. Only responses by Iranian forces explicitly claimed by the Islamic Republic of Iran, or confirmed to have originated from Iranian territory will count. Attacks on Israel by proxy forces will not count.

These announcements must occur before the end of July 2024, but he does not have to have formally resigned and be out of office before the end of July. An announcement of his intention to do so is sufficient to resolve this market.

(c) Iran initiates a military action on Israeli soil, airspace, or maritime territory between July 30 and August 12, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. For the purposes of this market, a "military action" will be considered to be any use of force executed by Iran on Israeli soil, airspace, or maritime territory (e.g. if a weapons depot on Israeli soil is hit by an Iranian missile, this market will resolve to "Yes") that is officially acknowledged by the Iranian government or a consensus of credible reporting. This includes, but is not limited to, airstrikes, naval attacks, or ground invasions. Cyber attacks, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not count towards the resolution of this market.

Only responses by Iranian forces explicitly claimed by the Islamic Republic of Iran, or confirmed to have originated from Iranian territory will count toward the resolution of this market. Attacks on Israel by proxy forces (i.e. Hezbollah, Houthis, etc.) will not count toward the resolution of this market.

question.title: Conditional on the linked market getting at least 377 traders by end of July 15, will Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: The linked market has at least 377 traders before market close on July 15, 11:59 PM Pacific Time. Then, will Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August 2024?

Resolution criteria for the condition: Resolves YES if the market has 377 traders before market close on July 15, 11:59 PM Pacific Time. Resolves NO otherwise.

Resolution criteria for the outcome: Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). Resolves NO otherwise. The duration of the incapacity does not matter. Biden exiting the office by death, resignation, etc., or invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

question.title: Given both the linked market gets at least 377 traders by July 15 and Biden is declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment before August, will Trump be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
question.body:

Then, will Donald Trump be charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al* before June 1, 2024? 

Resolution criteria for P: 
1. Resolves YES if the market embedded above has 377 traders before market close (July 15, 11:59 PM Pacific Time). Resolves NO otherwise.
2. Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question. Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

Resolution criteria for Q: Resolves YES if Donald Trump is charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

question.title: At the 2024 Olympics, will at least 5 countries win their debut gold medal?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if 5 or more countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal at the Paris Olympics, according to [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions).

question.title: Conditional on at least 5 countries winning their debut gold medal at the 2024 Olympics, will Kalenjin athletes win both the men's and women's marathon races?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: At the 2024 Paris Olympics, 5 or more countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal. Then, will Kalenjin athletes win both the men's and women's marathon races at the same Olympics?

Resolution criteria for the condition: The question resolves as **Yes** if 5 or more countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal at the Paris Olympics, according to credible sources.

Resolution criteria for the outcome: The question resolves as **Yes** if both the winner of the men's and women's marathon at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris have Kalenjin roots, according to credible sources. If the condition is not met, the question resolves as N/A.

question.title: Conditional on 5 countries winning their debut gold and Kalenjin athletes winning both marathons at the 2024 Olympics, will a terrorist act occur in metropolitan France during the Games?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: At the 2024 Olympics, at least 5 countries win their first-ever gold medal and both the men's and women's marathon races are won by athletes with Kalenjin roots. Then, will a terrorist act occur in metropolitan France during the 2024 Summer Olympics?

Resolution criteria for the condition: The question resolves as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met: (1) 5 or more countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal at the Paris Olympics, and (2) both the winner of the men's and women's marathon at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris have Kalenjin roots, according to credible sources.

Resolution criteria for the outcome: The question will resolve as Yes if a terrorist attack in Metropolitan France injures and/or kills at least one person, other than the terrorist(s), between, and inclusive of, the day of the Opening Ceremony (26 July 2024) and the day of the Closing Ceremony (11 August 2024). An event will be considered a 'terrorist attack' if it is described as such by any agency of the State of France, or by the French President, Prime Minister, or a member of the Council of Ministers.

question.title: Will both of the following occur during the 2024 Summer Olympics: (1) At least 5 countries win their debut gold medal and Kalenjin athletes win both the men's and women's marathon races, and (2) A terrorist act occurs in metropolitan France?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met: (1) At the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris, at least 5 countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal, and both the men's and women's marathon winners have Kalenjin roots according to credible sources. (2) A terrorist attack occurs in Metropolitan France that injures and/or kills at least one person, other than the terrorist(s), between the Opening Ceremony (26 July 2024) and the Closing Ceremony (11 August 2024). The event must be described as a 'terrorist attack' by any agency of the State of France, or by the French President, Prime Minister, or a member of the Council of Ministers.
